sentences.en: 'Commence,'was Monsieur Defarge's not unreasonable reply,'at the commencement.'
sentences.cn: “ 从开头说起, ” 德伐日的回答不无道理.

sentences.en: All applicants should be at least 16 years of age at the commencement of this course.
sentences.cn: 申请修读这门课程者至少要年满16岁。

sentences.en: And nothing was permitted to start until the commencement of the bombardment.
sentences.cn: 轰炸开始之前不许有任何行动.

sentences.en: At the commencement of each session he addresses both Houses together.
sentences.cn: 在议会每次会议开始时,他出席两院的联席会议.

sentences.en: Before leaving I attended the 47 th commencement of Cornell on June 16, 1914.
sentences.cn: 离校之前,我还在1914年6月16日参加了康乃尔的第47届毕业典礼.

sentences.en: Commencement of the legislation is subject to passage through the Parliament.
sentences.cn: 这一立法修订的启动取决于议会的通过.

sentences.en: How long is the period from the commencement to termination of insurance?
sentences.cn: 保险责任起止期限是多长?

sentences.en: President Bush gave the commencement address today at the University of Notre Dame.
sentences.cn: 布什总统今天在巴黎圣母院大学发表了毕业典礼演说。

sentences.en: Seeds begin to burgeon at the commencement of spring.
sentences.cn: 春天开始时种子开始发芽.

sentences.en: The commencement of articulate speech belongs to this period.
sentences.cn: 音节分明的语言即开始于这一期.

sentences.en: the commencement of the financial year
The raised material should be smoothed away before the commencement of the wear test.
sentences.cn: 在磨损试验开始之前应将隆起的材料弄平.

sentences.en: This contract is effective from the date of commencement of service.
sentences.cn: 本合同自聘期开始之日生效.

sentences.en: We each have had a commencement, and each stumbled and tottered on the threshold.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都有个开始, 每个人都在门槛上跌跌爬爬.
谁给你们做了毕业演说? oration指 “正式演说”,如:

sentences.en: Would passengers please put out cigarettes before the commencement of the flight.
sentences.cn: 请乘客在飞机起飞前熄灭香烟.

trans.tran_en: a ceremony at which university, college, or high school students receive their  diplomas
